game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact
game.description: The ancient artifact has been stolen from the museum. It's your job to find and return it.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a powerful magical ring

task.description: Go to the Grand Museum and gather clues about the theft.
Follow clues to Darkwood Forest, where the artifact is likely hidden.
Confront the bandits and retrieve the stolen artifact at their hideout.
